title: Hiren's BootCD PE 2018 - Latest Windows PE PE 6464 - USB Rescue
description:
Hiren's BootCD PE 2018 - Latest Windows PE PE 6464 - USB Rescue !{Latest}

Hiren's BootCD 2018 was officially released for technical brothers and pagans used, with many updates, patches perhaps this is the complete version so far.

If you are a computer technician in the old days, you also know Hiren's BootCD do rain as the wind that is the boss in the problem of computer rescue, repair problems related computer software as well. like the computer's hardware. Currently there are many tools should be singular as HKBoot , DLC Boot

If you do not already know this stuff, I can explain to you an easy to understand as follows:  Hiren's  a rescue tools computer is integrated into a CD, USB (It used to be USB) allows you to access into the Mini Windows directly on the USB.

With small capacity ~ 1GB allows you to do many things. When you visit the Windows Mini is Win XP, Win 7 Mini, ... now is Windows 10 Mini is inside the environment you have you can use many software tools to help you repair Windows problems. such as win, partition, ...

And now is the new  Hiren's BootCD PE 2018 with many new improvements over the old version has integrated sound card graphics, ... allows you in the Win mini environment connected to the Internet and use the browser to browse the Web more easily than ever.

- Select the device and ISO file Hiren's Boot CD PE:

The USB flash drive will be listed in the USB Device list. If the ISO file is in the same directory as  ISO2USB.exe  , then it is automatically selected. If not, you must manually select the ISO file by following the path to the ISO file
